mapper.select: SELECT b.nick_name as "nickName", b.avatar_url as "avatarUrl", b.gender as "gender", b.jp_num as "jpNum" from jf_yk_log as a left join youke as b on a.openid = b.openid where a.jf_id=#{jfId}

SELECT a.one as "one", a.two as "two", a.three as "three", a.total as "total", a.ord as "ord", b.nick_name as "nickName", b.avatar_url as "avatarUrl", b.gender as "gender", b.openid as "openid" from jf_yk_log as a left join youke as b on a.openid = b.openid where a.jf_id=#{jfId} order by a.total DESC
